Posts.Content: So if I ever ended up in one, I would probably end up playing the ATM machine by mistake for an hour wondering why I just can't win anything?!
Posts.Title: So - how was your Holiday weekend?

Posts.Content: I thought I would get through this just like the 1st chemo. As the next date approaches I am getting more and more depressed and irritated. Just don't want to lay down and let the stinkin' truck roll over me again! So tired all of the time, and friends and family want me to participate in visits I just can't do it! People want to come over and I avoid it because my house is messy so I would have to clean and I would have to go grocery shopping to have something for them to eat. And then there are the ones that want me to commit to coming to them...which is almost an hourly thing with me because I am bone tired. I keep sitting down to rest then fall asleep. Then other times I feel ok and they can't understand. GGGGRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR. My sisters, should I just let them come over and pick through the fridge themselves to find something? and wade through the dogs' toys to find a seat on the couch that needs cleaning too? I want to have some energy to care damn it.
Posts.Title: 3rd chemo on Friday...this is getting harder to do!

Posts.Content: You not only made it you have a great attitude, and a sense of humor. You made it!!!! And I am happy with you. I wanna make it too. Hugs, Rebecca
Posts.Title: Just saying

Posts.Content: I liked the article too. It is just how I feel right now.
Posts.Title: This is spot on!

Posts.Content: But, as the sisters have said, we know it is for a good end result. Did you know it also elevates your sugar? Just found that out this last time at the Oncologist. Still, we need it to do a couple of things that I am aware of. I know it is a big inhibitor of allergic reaction to the chemo drugs, and it is used as an anti-nausea. Do you know what it is supposed to be doing for you for the rads? Almost there....can you smell the coffee at the finish line? I can hardly wait until coffee tastes like coffee again. I hope this week seems to fly by for you! {{{{Hugs}}}} Rebecca
Posts.Title: warning...I'm gonna whine

Posts.Content: What happened during your absence? Is everything ok? C'mon spill the beans! You sassy cat!
Posts.Title: I'm back!!! Did you miss me? Maybe a little bit? LOL

Posts.Content: I want to touch the soil and look at the sky from that land. I want to cry at the wailing wall and pray.
Posts.Title: A bucket list....
